name: Army Training Mission
description:
Army Training Mission is best of US army and military academy game where you enjoy the real army basic training duty, adventures boot camp and many more army operations. It is informally known as army commando boot camp and is the program to assault course army basic training.
Features:
• 3d environments sniper shooting environment
• Real life top notch sound effects
• US Army commando training tactics
• Super training courses
• Addictive gameplay
• Challenging & breathtaking Missions
